name: Zombies! (itch)
description:
WARNING: This game contains fast flashing images!

You have one goal: DON'T DIE.

You must survive the zombie invasion and defend the hospital. Protect the sick people from getting infected. If you fail, you may just live to regret it.

If a zombie touches you, you get hurt. Shoot the zombies to defeat them. Most zombies drop useful loot. Some are more useful than others, so choose wisely when your ammo is low.

CONTROLS

Game:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left Mouse and Right Mouse to shoot
  • R to call for an airdrop (if you have a radio)
  • K to give up
  • Esc to pause

Other:

  • F4 to toggle full screen and window mode
  • F9 to take screenshot
  • Esc (from main menu) to exit to desktop

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

  • Dual-core CPU (2GHz or better)
  • Intel HD 4000 graphics card
  • 4GB RAM (32-bit must use virtual memory)
  • 10 MB (Yes, with an 'M') free hard drive space
